revised_title: On the Detection and Estimation of Precious Metals in Metallurgical Products Using Vaporised Metal Films
tldr: The author investigates the use of vaporized metal films for chemical analysis, particularly in detecting and estimating precious metals in metallurgical products. The method involves using an induction coil to create deposits of different tenuity, which can be analyzed for their color and composition. The author demonstrates the effectiveness of this method in detecting gold, silver, and other precious metals in various materials.
